text: Osogna was a municipality of the district Riviera in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. On 2 April 2017, the former municipalities of Cresciano, Iragna, Lodrino and Osogna merged to form the new municipality of Riviera. == References == ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Ticino Category:2017 disestablishments in Switzerland
title: Osogna
